Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.1 Sappaccayaduka » 2.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.1.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaccayaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
15.
572Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, naanantare ekaṃ, nasamanantare ekaṃ, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye ekaṃ…pe…  nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā ekaṃ, novigate ekaṃ. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
573Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
